Error.Message: SQLSTATE[42S22]: Column not found: 1054 Unknown column 'InvestIdentity' in 'order clause'

Argument.SQL:
SELECT			IT.*, 
				CONCAT(IT.InvestTransactionID, '') AS InvestTransactionLookupCaption, 
				'' AS _Other

FROM			ims_investtransaction AS IT
	/*LEFT JOIN		X AS Y ON Y.YID = IT.YID*/
 WHERE 1 = 1 AND IT.InvestTransactionIsActive = 1  ORDER BY InvestIdentity ASC  LIMIT 0, 50
